definitions.body: id.—´[[ח]] Ho 13:15 + 8 t.; cstr. [[חֶמְדַּת]] 1Sa 9:20 + 3 t.; sf. [[חֶמְדָּתִי]] Je 12:10; [[חֶמְדָּתֵח]] Ez Eze 26:12; [[חֶמְדָּתָם]] Da 11:8; —desire of Israel 1Sa 9:20 sq. [[לְ]] before obj. of desire; ´[[בְּלאׁ ח]] = without desire 2Ch 21:20 (i.e. he lived as no one desired), v. Öt LXX (not LXXL) Vulgate; concrete: [[ישׂראל]] ´[[כל־ח]] 1Sa 9:20 and for whom is all that is desirable in Isr.? so LXX Vulgate RV Dr; (>AV and on whom is all the desire of Isr.?); cf. [[כל־הגוים]] ´[[ובאו ח]] Hag 2:7 (i.e. the desirable, precious things of all nations); elsewh. after cstr. as [[חֶמֶד]]; esp. ´[[כלי ח]] Ho 13:15, Na 2:10, Je 25:34, 2Ch 32:27, 2Ch 36:10, Da 11:8; ´[[שְׂכִיּוֹת ח]] Is 2:16, ´[[אֶרֶץ ח]] Ps 106:24, Je 3:19, Zec 7:14, cf. ´[[חֶלְקַת ח]] Je 12:10; ´[[בתי ח]] Ez Eze 26:12; [[נשׁים]] ´[[ח]] Da 11:37, appar. ref. to some obj. of idolatrous worship, perhaps Adonis = Tammuz Ew Bev (Astarte, Meinh).
